doc:
Bruce Jones (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Jones_(actor) 0 Bruce Jones (born Ian Roy Jones on 24 January 1953) is an English actor, best known for his role as taxi driver Les Battersby in Coronation Street. He left the role in 2007. Jones' real name is Ian Roy Jones, but he uses his father's name for professional purposes. Bruce_Jones ( born Ian_Roy_Jones on 24_January_1953 ) is an_English_actor , best_known for his_role as taxi_driver_Les_Battersby in Coronation_Street . He left the_role in 2007 . Jones '_real_name is Ian_Roy_Jones , but he uses his_father 's_name for professional_purposes .
